channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mark Hammond

item.title: Wave-Mean Flow Interactions in the Atmospheric Circulation of Tidally Locked Planets
item.description: Our paper on wave-mean flow interaction on tidally locked planets has been accepted by ApJ – here’s the preprint!

item.title: Linking the Climate and Thermal Phase Curve of 55 Cancri e
item.description:
Our paper on the climate of 55 Cancri e has been accepted by ApJ – here’s the preprint!

We found that the observations of Demory (2016) did not rule out an atmosphere, and that our GCM results could be consistent given an atmosphere of several bar, a mean-molecular weight of about 5 g/mol, and cloud formation high on the night-side.
